passives.name: Sinister Pact
passives.effects: Increase your {{as|ability power}} by {{as|{{fd|1.5}}%|ap}} and gain {{as|{{fd|1.5}}% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for every {{as|100 '''current''' health}} you are missing, up to an increase of {{as|45% ability power}} and {{as|45% '''bonus''' movement speed}} at {{as|3000 '''current''' health}} missing.

effects_structured.raw: Increase your {{as ability power}} by {{as {{fd 1.5}}% ap}} and gain {{as {{fd 1.5}}% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for every {{as 100 '''current''' health}} you are missing, up to an increase of {{as 45% ability power}} and {{as 45% '''bonus''' movement speed}} at {{as 3000 '''current''' health}} missing.

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
context_notes: Bonuses scale off missing current health, capped at 3000 missing health (45% AP and 45% bonus move speed).
